message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.DB. 

This paper proposes a new approach to expressing iterative tasks in logic programming, which is a core topic in programming languages (cs.PL) and logic (cs.LO). The paper also discusses the advantages of this approach in terms of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and software engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper proposes a new type of goal formula, which could be relevant to database systems (cs.DB).
